message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go as low as $110. How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I'm still willing to work with you, Bob. I can do $122, but that's as low as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $118?
